content.p: Hear about NatSci Soc University may seem daunting. It’s a time when there are lots of changes in your life, but you won’t be doing it alone. You’ll make loads of new friends, and what better way to socialise than by joining a society. As a natural sciences student NatSci Soc is the perfect way to make friends and get involved with the natural sciences community here at UoN. Considering joining the sports team? There's plenty of opportunity to get involved. Fancy getting dressed up in your best clothes – the annual science ball is perfect for that. We also hold the boat party with plenty of food and music for everyone. No idea what you want to do when you graduate? The society arrange alumni speaker events which are great for networking and hearing about what jobs natural scientists go on to do. NatSci Soc is full of likeminded people from each course year so provides a great chance to make friends and try new things so you’ll have no problems fitting in. Student created animation for NatSciSoc, the natural sciences society Promoting mental health and wellbeing is a top priority at the University of Nottingham. We are dedicated to helping you make the most of your time from the moment you arrive here.
